document.docAuthor: Hughes, Lauren E. & Peart, Rachael A.
document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of Ampithoidae (Peracarida: Amphipoda) from Australian Waters

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of Ampithoidae (Peracarida: Amphipoda) from Australian Waters

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ampithoe kulafi J.L. Barnard, 1970 : 50
.—Sivaprakasam, 1971 : 77–79 , fig. 6 .—J.L. Barnard, 1979 : 21 .—Ledoyer, 1973 : 26 , pl. 1 .—Ledoyer, 1979 : 146 , fig. 31 .—Conlan, 1982 : 2020 .—Myers, 1985 : 40–42 , fig. 29 .—Barnard & Karaman, 1991 : 104 .—Myers, 1997 : 108 .—Ortiz & Lalana, 1999 : 193 .—Ren, 2001 : 66 .—Ren, 2006 : 210–212 , fig. 78 .

Not
Ampithoe kulafi
—Ledoyer, 1982 : 120–121 , fig. 39 . (=
A. lafkui Appadoo & Myers, 2004
).

Type locality.
The west reef between Elangalap Islet and north tip of Falarik Islet, Ifaluk Island , Caroline Islands .

Material examined. Christmas Island :
12 specimens
, AM P. 81787 , dive site “Chicken Farm” (
10 ° 24 ’ 56 ”S
105 ° 41 ’03”E
), 12 m , fine red algae and dead coral
Acropora
sp.,
23 October 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry (MI WA 930 );
1 specimen
, AM P. 81789 , dive site “Chicken Farm” (
10 ° 24 ’ 56 ”S
105 ° 41 ’03”E
), 14 m , rubble with fine red algae,
23 October 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry (MI WA 933 );
4 specimens
, AM P. 81792 , dive site “Chicken Farm” (
10 ° 24 ’ 56 ”S
105 ° 41 ’03”E
), 14.8 m , rubble with fine brown algae,
23 October 2008
, coll. K.B. Attwood (MI WA 926 );
3 specimens
, AM P. 81793 , dive site “Million Dollar Bommie” (
10 ° 27 ’ 22 ”S
105 ° 38 ’ 11 ”E
), 14 m , coral
Acropora
sp. with tufted algae, sand and red algae,
18 October 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry and K.B. Attwood (MI WA 867 );
1 specimen
, AM P. 81794 , dive site “Million Dollar Bommie” (
10 ° 27 ’ 22 ”S
105 ° 38 ’ 11 ”E
), 12 m , coarse rubble,
18 October 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry (MI WA 866 );
1 specimen
, AM P. 81791 , Eidsvold Wreck (
10 ° 26 ’ 34 ”S
105 ° 39 ’ 32 ”E
), 10.6 m , algae covered plate coral
Acropora
sp.,
24 October 2008
, coll. K.B. Attwood (MI WA 946 );
1 specimen
, AM P. 81788 , Merriel Beach (
10 ° 28 ’ 26 ”S
105 ° 33 ’ 29 ”E
), 15.5 m , rubble,
21 October 2008
, coll. L.E. Hughes (MI WA 904 );
1 specimen
, AM P. 81790 , West White Beach (
10 ° 27 ’ 41 ”S
105 ° 34 ’ 54 ”E
), 7.9 m , green calcareous alga
Halimeda
sp.,
18 October 2008
, coll. L.E. Hughes and K.B. Attwood (MI WA 868 ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3.
Ampithoe kuala Myers, 1985
, male, 8.0 mm, AM P.90106, Torres Strait, Queensland, scales 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cocos (Keeling) Islands :
3 specimens
, AM P. 81871 , dive site “Winter Wall”, near Horsburgh Island (
12 °05’ 15 ”S
96 ° 50 ’ 14 ”E
), 3 m , mooring buoy,
12 October 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry (MI WA 838 );
4 specimens
, AM P. 81870 , northeast corner of the lagoon (
12 °06’ 18 ”S
96 ° 51 ’ 11 ”E
), 3 m , seagrass beds
Thalassia hemprichii
base and stems covered in epiphytes,
10 October 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry (MI WA 810 );
10 specimens
, AM P. 81872 , northeast corner of the lagoon (
12 °06’ 18 ”S
96 ° 51 ’ 11 ”E
), 3 m , seagrass beds
Thalassia hemprichii
,
10 October 2008
, coll. L.E. Hughes (MI WA 813 );
1 specimen
, AM P. 82182 , West Island ( Pulo Panjang) (
12 ° 10 ’S
96 ° 49 ’E
), on algae with rubble, reef flat,
26 April 1979
, coll. H. Cogger and R. Sadlier.

Western Australia :
9 specimens
, WAM C 52221 , Long Reef, The Kimberley (
13 ° 49 ’ 11 ”S
125 ° 46 ’ 48 ”E
), intertidal,
23 October 2010
, coll. Andrew Hosie ( 55 /K 10 -Q 1 , Woodside Kimberley Survey 2010 ).

Remarks. Material examined here extends the distribution of
A. kulafi
into the southeast Indian Ocean.

Distribution. Ifaluk Islands (Barnard 1965 ). Madagascar (Ledoyer 1979, 1982). Fiji (Myers 1985 ). Tonga (Myers 1986 a). Kosrae (Myers 1995 ). Western Samoa (Myers 1997 ). South China Sea: Hainan Island (Ren 2001 ; 2006 ). Indian Ocean: Madras, India (Sivaprakasam 1970 ); Western Australia , Cocos (Keeling) Islands and Christmas Island (current study).
